Chantilly General Trading LLC

Why Chantilly?

Our multinational trading team has strategic partners from around the world – from China to France, Germany, South Africa, United Kingdom and the Middle East.

We are a company with over 20 years of solid experience and proven track record in international trade.

Our Services

Sourcing and Supply of Excellent Products

Medical

We supply different kinds of medical supplies and equipment like medical oxygen canisters, personal hygiene products, scanning & diagnostic equipment.

General Commodity

Provision of rice, wheat, nuts, flour, household items, canned goods, and other fast moving consumer goods.

Freight and Logistics

We provide integrated Freight and Logistics Solutions.

Oil and Gas

Supply of crude oil, diesel, fuel oil, Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) and Liquified Natural Gas (LNG).

Building Materials

Sourcing and procurement of building materials like cement, wood, clinker, metals and steel frames.

Home and Office Furnishings

Offer countless models of home and office furnishings.

Printing and Packaging

Procurement and sale of equipment and materials for printing and packaging.

Construction

Procurement of construction equipment such as excavators, concrete mixers, backhoes, loaders, dump trucks, and others.

Vehicle

Procurement of vehicle such as cars jeep, van, minibus, mini truck and trucks.
